name: Google Maps Agent
description: Plan routes, remember places, and generate directions

skills.name: Route planning
skills.description: Helps plan routing between two locations
examples: plan my route from Sunnyvale to Mountain View
what's the commute time from Sunnyvale to San Francisco at 9AM
create turn by turn directions from Sunnyvale to Mountain View

skills.name: My Map
skills.description: Manage a custom map with your own saved places
examples: show me my favorite restaurants on the map
create a visual of all places I've visited in the past year
